content: कदंबः, --कदंबकः [कद् करणे अंबच् <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} A kind of tree (said to put forth buds at the roaring of thunderclouds); कतिपयकुसुमोद्गमः कदंबः <ls>U. 3. 20</ls>, <ls n="U. 3.">42</ls>; <ls>Māl. 3. 7</ls>; <ls>Me. 25</ls>; <ls>R. 12. 99.</ls> {@--2@} A kind of grass. {@--3@} Turmeric. {@--4@} The mustard-seed plant. {@--5@} A particular mineral substance. --बी <ab>N.</ab> of a plant (देवदाली). <ls>Ś. 6</ls>; <ls>U. 5. 18.</ls> --बं A multitude. --कं {@--1@} A multitude, group; छायाबद्धकदंबकं मृगकुलं रोमंथमभ्यस्यतु <ls>Ś. 2. 6.</ls> {@--2@} The flower of the Kadamba tree; पृथुकदंबकदंबकराजितं <ls>Ki. 5. 9.</ls> {@--3@} A kind of grass (देवताड).
